item.description:
Killer Film Fest’s 1st Annual Zombie Pub Crawl will be held in Cambridge and Somerville, MA on November 5th 2011.

 

Itinerary

The Rise of the Dead: 1:30pm – 2:00pm

Pub crawl representatives arrive at the Cambridge Common Park at 1:00pm.

(The meetup group will gather here by the Irish Famine Memorial at 1:30pm to put finishing touches on makeup and discuss zombie invasion tactics.)

 

Cambridge Common Restaurant & Bar: 2:00pm – 2:45pm

The Zombie Pub Crawl will begin with a short walk to the Cambridge Common Restaurant & Bar for a quick 1-2 drink stop. (Pro tip: Grab something to eat here, it will help with the alcohol absorption)

 

Christopher's Restaurant & Bar: 2:45pm – 3:30pm

The horde will then continue with a short walk to Christopher's Restaurant & Bar.

 

The Burren: 3:30pm – 4:15pm

The horde will then continue with a short walk to The Burren.

 

Joshua Tree Bar & Grill: 4:15pm – 5:00pm

The horde will then continue across the street to Joshua Tree Bar & Grill. This will be the last stop of the official Pub Crawl, but we can always continue the invasion elsewhere.

 

Other Details:

1. Please also sign up here: http://killerfilmfest.com/zombie_signup.html

2. Zombie do's and don'ts

3. Attendees will be given my cell phone number the week of the event, in case you can't find the group.

4. You must look like a zombie (Brandy's rule)...if you need help dressing as a zombie....Click Here.

5. My cell is 412_418_O158, if you can't find the group at any time tomorrow.
item.name: Zombie Pub Crawl (21+ Only)
